cause.description:
If someone you've loved has ever dumped you, you know what I mean. I wish someone could create a pill that would make it all better, one dose and no more pain!
1. Love is a delicate thing.
2. Don't hurt the people you love.
3. Be there for your friends when they're hurt.
cause.mission: help people who have ever felt the pain of a broken heart.
cause.name: People for a cure to a broken heart.
